617470.name: Fantasy Grounds - Heroic Characters 15 (Token Pack)
617470.description:
Heroic Characters 15

This token pack contains 36 tokens. This pack contains a variety of characters that can be used as PCs or NPCs.
This Token Pack includes:
  • Female Deep Gnome Wizard
  • Female Demon Kin fighter
  • Female Drow Matron
  • Female Elf Sorceress
  • Female Gnome Wizard
  • Female Half-Elf Rogue
  • Female Halfling Rogue
  • 2 Female Half-Orc Fighters
  • Female Half-Orc Heavy Fighter
  • Female Human Sorceress
  • Female Tiefling Young Sorceress
  • Male Angelic Reaper
  • Male Black Knight
  • Male Brooding Sorcerer
  • 3 Male Dark Knights
  • Male Demon Kin Fighter
  • 2 Male Dragon Kin Fighters
  • Male Dwarf Fighter
  • Male Dwarven Bard
  • Male Dwarven Dual Weapons
  • Male Dwarven Hammer Cannon
  • Male Elf Battle Mage
  • 2 Male Elf Jungle Hunters
  • Male Elf Ranger
  • Male Elf Wizard
  • Male Gnome Cleric
  • Male Half-Orc Warrior
  • Male Half-Elf Ranger
  • Male Halfling Ranger
  • Male Kobold Fighter Magic User
  • Male Tiefling Sorcerer
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
